findings.rationale: The two-year duration may not provide sufficient protection for sensitive information, especially if it involves long-term strategic plans or proprietary data.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidentiality obligations shall continue for two (2) years after termination of discussions.

findings.risk_title: Lack of Specificity in Confidential Information
findings.rationale: The broad definition of Confidential Information may lead to disputes over what constitutes confidential data and could expose parties to unintentional breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all proprietary information disclosed by one party to the other.

findings.risk_title: No Limitation on Use of Information
findings.rationale: The agreement permits use of the information only for evaluating business opportunities, but lacks specifics on what constitutes acceptable use, increasing risk of misuse.
findings.evidence_quote: Not use the information for any purpose other than evaluating business opportunities.
